name: manager
descri tion: GUI Management Console for Minecraft Servers

scripts.build: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run build:preload" "npm run build:css" && electron-builder --config.compression=store
scripts.build:win: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run build:preload" "npm run build:css" && electron-builder --win --config.win.target=portable --config.compression=store
scripts.// Note 1: Artifacts用: 高速化のため圧縮なし(store)。Windowsのみビルド
scripts.ci:artifact:win: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run build:preload" "npm run build:css" && electron-builder --win --config.win.target=portable --config.compression=store
scripts.// Note 2: Releases用: サイズ削減のため最大圧縮(maximum)。全OSビルド
scripts.ci:release:linux: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run build:preload" "npm run build:css" && electron-builder --linux --config.compression=maximum
scripts.ci:release:win: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run build:preload" "npm run build:css" && electron-builder --win --config.compression=maximum
scripts.ci:release:mac: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run build:preload" "npm run build:css" && electron-builder --mac --config.compression=maximum
